# code to write new featurette

```{r, eval=FALSE}
new_experiment <- function(name){
  
  dir <- paste0(Sys.Date(),"-", name)
  
  dir.create(dir)
  readLines("template.Rmd") |>
    writeLines(con = paste0(dir,"/", name, ".Rmd"))
  
} 

new_experiment("ggformula")
```
